public interface Borrowable

  • Method Details

    • borrowItem

      void borrowItem(LibraryItem libraryItem, User user) throws Exception
      Allows a user to borrow the item.
      Parameters:
      user - The user attempting to borrow the item.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the item cannot be borrowed.

    • returnItem

      void returnItem(LibraryItem libraryItem, User user) throws Exception
      Allows a user to return the borrowed item.
      Parameters:
      user - The user returning the item.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the item cannot be returned.

    • isAvailable

      boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if the item is available for borrowing.
      Returns:
      True if the item is available; false otherwise.

    • getDueDate

      LocalDate getDueDate()
      Gets the due date of the borrowed item.
      Returns:
      The due date; null if the item is not borrowed.
